      private Character[] initCharacters()

      Returns:
      an Array of characters

    • initIslands

      private ArrayList<Island> initIslands()
      Initializes islands to start the game
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of islands, each one with a student, for a total of two students per color

    • initClouds

      private ArrayList<Cloud> initClouds()
      Initializes clouds to start the game
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of empty clouds, each one of the desired size

    • initProfessorMap

      private Map<Color,Player> initProfessorMap()
      Initializes professors to start the game
      Returns:
      a Map with the five colors as keys and 5 null as values

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int steps)
      Moves mother nature of the given number of steps
      Parameters:
      steps - the number of steps which mother nature is moved of

    • setIslandOwner

      public void setIslandOwner(Island island, TowerColor newTowerColor)
      Sets a new towerColor for the given Island and checks if that island can now be merged with adjacent ones
      Parameters:
      island - the Island which owner has to be changed
      newTowerColor - the TowerColor of the team which will own the Island

    • mergeIfPossible

      private void mergeIfPossible(Island island)
      Checks if the given Island can be merged with adjacent ones
      Parameters:
      island - the Island to be checked

    • mergeIslands

      private void mergeIslands(Island left, Island right)
      Merges two islands and moves mother nature accordingly. The islands must be adjacent
      Parameters:
      left - the first Island to be merged
      right - the second Island to be merged

    • mergeIslands

      private void mergeIslands(Island first, Island second, Island third)
      Merges three islands and moves mother nature accordingly
      Parameters:
      first - the first Island to be merged
      second - the second Island to be merged
      third - the third Island to be merged

    • getOwnerOfProfessor

      public Player getOwnerOfProfessor(Color color)
      Returns the Player who owns the professor of the given color or null if nobody owns the professor
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the professor to check
      Returns:
      null if nobody owns the professor, or the Player who owns the professor

    • setOwnerOfProfessor

      Parameters:
      color - the color of the professor
      player - the new owner of the professor

    • getColorsOfOwnedProfessors

      public List<Color> getColorsOfOwnedProfessors(Player player)
      Given a Player, returns a List of the colors of the professors which he/she owns
      Parameters:
      player - the Player to check the owned professors of
      Returns:
      a List of the colors of which that Player owns the professor of
